0: username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

username=`grep -B 1 'username:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && password=`grep -B 1 'password:' /config/config.yml | tail -n1 | awk '{ print $2}'` && curl --fail $username:$password@localhost:3030/triggers/manual

nodeAffinity:
  preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 60
      preference:
        matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
              - amd64
              - i386
              - i686
              - x86

for i in $(seq 1 180); do
  test -f /host/etc/cni/net.d/10-calico.conflist && exit 0
  sleep 1
done
exit 1
The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }} is expiring

The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }}
on resolver {{ "{{ $labels.resolver }}" }} is invalid

while true ; do
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetching metrics ..."
  curl -s 'http://snmp-exporter-sr505n:9116/snmp?module=sr505n_dsl&target=192.168.1.1' | sponge /config/sr505n.prom
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetch complete."
  sleep 300
done

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[01/04] Connect to repo ..."       && kopia repo connect filesystem --path=/snapshots --override-hostname=cluster --override-username=root
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[02/04] Set maintenance owner ..." && kopia maintenance set --owner=root@cluster
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[03/04] Run maintenance ..."       && kopia maintenance run --full
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[04/04] Disconnect from repo ..."  && kopia repo disconnect

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done

printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[01/03] Connect to repo ..."      && kopia repo connect filesystem --path=/snapshots --override-hostname=cluster --override-username=root
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[02/03] Sync to remote ..."       && kopia repo sync-to from-config --file=/remote/repository.config --parallel 8 --delete
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "[03/03] Disconnect from repo ..." && kopia repo disconnect

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Awaiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done
